statements: SELECT * FROM athlete_health_management;
SELECT athlete_name, injury_description, recovery_timeline FROM athlete_health_management WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, treatment_plan FROM athlete_health_management WHERE recovery_timeline < '2022-01-01';
SELECT athlete_id, injury_description FROM athlete_health_management ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_health_management WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%rest%';
SELECT * FROM athlete_health_management WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_name, recovery_timeline FROM athlete_health_management WHERE injury_description LIKE '%sprain%';
SELECT * FROM athlete_health_management ORDER BY recovery_timeline DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, treatment_plan FROM athlete_health_management WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_name, recovery_timeline, treatment_plan FROM athlete_health_management WHERE recovery_timeline BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM athlete_injuries;
SELECT athlete_id, injury_type, doctor_name FROM athlete_injuries;
SELECT * FROM athlete_injuries WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT recovery_id, start_date, end_date, recovery_status FROM recovery_timeline;
SELECT athlete_id, injury_description FROM athlete_injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain';
SELECT * FROM athlete_injuries ORDER BY athlete_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT injury_type, treatment_plan, recovery_timeline FROM athlete_injuries WHERE recovery_timeline >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(injury_id) AS num_injuries FROM recovery_timeline GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING num_injuries > 1
SELECT DISTINCT doctor_name FROM athlete_injuries WHERE LENGTH(doctor_name) > 10
SELECT athlete_id, injury_type, treatment_plan FROM athlete_injuries WHERE injury_description LIKE '%sprain%'
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, age, height, weight FROM athletes;
SELECT * FROM injuries WHERE recovery_time > 30;
SELECT athlete_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM injuries ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT treatment_description, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM treatment_plans WHERE athlete_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM athletes JOIN treatment_plans ON athletes.athlete_id = treatment_plans.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, age, height FROM athletes WHERE weight < 70;
SELECT athlete_name, injury_type, injury_date FROM athletes JOIN injuries ON athletes.athlete_id = injuries.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_name, treatment_description, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM athletes JOIN treatment_plans ON athletes.athlete_id = treatment_plans.athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_name, age, height, weight, injury_type, recovery_time FROM athletes JOIN injuries ON athletes.athlete_id = injuries.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT name, age FROM Athletes WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) as num_injuries FROM Injuries GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT treatment_type, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE treatment_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT recovery_date, recovery_progress, remarks FROM RecoveryTimelines ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT name, age, height FROM Athletes ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT injury_type, recovery_status FROM Injuries WHERE recovery_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT name, injury_type, recovery_progress FROM Athletes JOIN Injuries ON Athletes.athlete_id = Injuries.athlete_id;

SELECT name, treatment_type, start_date, end_date FROM Athletes INNER JOIN Injuries ON Athletes.athlete_id = Injuries.athlete_id INNER JOIN TreatmentPlans ON Injuries.injury_id = TreatmentPlans.injury_id ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, gender FROM Athletes ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE treatment_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT athlete_id, recovery_stage, recovery_date FROM RecoveryTimelines WHERE recovery_stage = 'Completed' ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_id, name, injury_type FROM Athletes JOIN Injuries ON Athletes.athlete_id = Injuries.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM Injuries WHERE recovery_time > 30 ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, athlete_id, treatment_type FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
